perturbation.original_text: 3.1 Invoices. Sutro shall invoice SutroVax at the time of each shipment of Product(s) for the Price for such shipment. SutroVax will pay such invoices within [***] days of receipt of invoice (including all required documentation) by SutroVax.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.1 Invoices. Sutro shall invoice SutroVax at the time of each shipment of Product(s) for the Price for such shipment. SutroVax will pay such invoices within [***] days of receipt of invoice (including all required documentation) by SutroVax. However, if SutroVax disputes any portion of the invoice, SutroVax will notify Sutro within [***] days of receipt of the invoice and may withhold payment of the disputed amount until the dispute is resolved. The undisputed portion of the invoice shall still be paid within [***] days.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces an in-text contradiction by adding a condition that allows SutroVax to dispute an invoice and withhold payment on the disputed portion. This conflicts with the original clause that states SutroVax *will* pay invoices within [***] days without any mention of potential disputes or withholding.

perturbation.original_text: 2.9.2 Delivery Delays. Subject to Section 2.4.1 (including applicable lead times agreed upon in accordance with Section 2.4.1) Sutro shall make deliveries of Product(s) in accordance with Section 2.6, no more than [***] days before or [***] after the delivery dates specified by SutroVax in the relevant purchase order (provided that such delivery date is in accordance with the applicable Work Order or such purchase order was otherwise accepted by Sutro) (the "Delivery Time Period"). For any failure to supply compliant Product(s) in the later of the Delivery Time Period and the period ending [***] after the delivery date specified under the Work Order, without limiting SutroVax's other remedies, subject to this Section 2.9.2 and Section 9.3 (Limitation of Liability), Sutro shall be liable for any non-cancelable Third Party penalties, costs and expenses incurred by SutroVax as a result of Sutro's failure to supply Product(s) as aforesaid, subject to receipt by Sutro of appropriate documentary evidence of such penalties, costs and expenses to the extent such evidence of such amounts may be provided by SutroVax without breaching SutroVax's or its Affiliates' duties of confidentiality to such Third Party (and provided that SutroVax shall use commercially reasonable efforts to (i) minimize or eliminate such penalties, costs and expenses and (ii) where provision of such evidence to Sutro would result in a breach of such duties of confidentiality, to obtain the consent of the applicable Third Party to the provision of such evidence to Sutro). In the event that Sutro makes a Manufacturing Change and is not able to Manufacture and supply Product in conformance with the Required Standards within [***] days of the delivery date identified on the applicable purchase order, Sutro shall Manufacture such Product without such Manufacturing Change. The rights of SutroVax set forth in this paragraph are in addition to any other rights set forth in this Supply Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.9.2 Delivery Delays. Subject to Section 2.4.1 (including applicable lead times agreed upon in accordance with Section 2.4.1) Sutro shall make deliveries of Product(s) in accordance with Section 2.6, no more than [***] days before or [***] after the delivery dates specified by SutroVax in the relevant purchase order (provided that such delivery date is in accordance with the applicable Work Order or such purchase order was otherwise accepted by Sutro) (the "Delivery Time Period"). For any failure to supply compliant Product(s) in the later of the Delivery Time Period and the period ending [***] after the delivery date specified under the Work Order, without limiting SutroVax's other remedies, subject to this Section 2.9.2 and Section 9.3 (Limitation of Liability), Sutro shall be liable for any non-cancelable Third Party penalties, costs and expenses incurred by SutroVax as a result of Sutro's failure to supply Product(s) as aforesaid, subject to receipt by Sutro of appropriate documentary evidence of such penalties, costs and expenses to the extent such evidence of such amounts may be provided by SutroVax without breaching SutroVax's or its Affiliates' duties of confidentiality to such Third Party (and provided that SutroVax shall use commercially reasonable efforts to (i) minimize or eliminate such penalties, costs and expenses and (ii) where provision of such evidence to Sutro would result in a breach of such duties of confidentiality, to obtain the consent of the applicable Third Party to the provision of such evidence to Sutro). Sutro shall be exempt from liability for delivery delays if the delay is due to a Force Majeure event, regardless of the duration of the delay. In the event that Sutro makes a Manufacturing Change and is not able to Manufacture and supply Product in conformance with the Required Standards within [***] days of the delivery date identified on the applicable purchase order, Sutro shall Manufacture such Product without such Manufacturing Change. The rights of SutroVax set forth in this paragraph are in addition to any other rights set forth in this Supply Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction by introducing a blanket exemption for Sutro from liability for delivery delays caused by Force Majeure events, regardless of the delay's duration. This conflicts with the prior clause which explicitly outlines a time-bound liability for Sutro for failing to supply compliant products. Even though a force majeure clause exists elsewhere, this new addition directly impacts delivery delays and payment which can be disputed.

perturbation.original_text: 10.2.2 in its entirety by a Party if the other Party materially breaches any of the material terms, conditions or agreements contained in this Supply Agreement to be kept, observed or performed by the other Party, by giving the Party who committed the breach [***] days' prior written notice, unless the notified Party shall have cured the breach within such [***]-day period; and
perturbation.changed_text: 10.2.2 in its entirety by a Party if the other Party materially breaches any of the material terms, conditions or agreements contained in this Supply Agreement to be kept, observed or performed by the other Party, by giving the Party who committed the breach [***] days' prior written notice, unless the notified Party shall have cured the breach within such [***]-day period; provided, however, that a material breach of the confidentiality obligations under Article 8 shall automatically result in immediate termination without any cure period.
perturbation.explanation: The modification introduces a direct contradiction by stating that a breach of confidentiality (Article 8) results in *immediate* termination *without* a cure period. This conflicts with the initial clause that states any material breach requires [***] days' notice and a cure period.
